properties.areaDesc: Southern Petroleum and Southern Garfield Counties; The Lower Missouri River Breaks including the Charles M Russell National Wildlife Refuge; The Little Rockies
properties.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 1 at 2:58PM MST until February 1 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Glasgow MT
properties.description:
...FIRE WEATHER DANGER CONTINUES TODAY THROUGH THIS EVENING...

.Strong gusty winds and low relative humidity will persist through
most of the area ahead of an approaching cold front.

* AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 135, 136 and 137.

* TIMING...Until 11 PM Tonight.

* WINDS...From the west at 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph.
For higher elevation areas, such as the Little Rockies in
southwestern Phillips County, expect sustained winds of 55 to 70
mph with gusts up to 85 mph.

* RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 21 percent.

* IMPACTS...New fire starts will spread quickly toward the east and
become difficult to control.
properties.instruction:
Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in these
areas of this Red Flag Warning.

NWSheadline: RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 135, 136 AND 137
